mapper.select: select a.account_id, a.openid, a.avatar, a.name, a.city, a.self_desc,b.school,b.college,c.company from ((account a left join education b on a.account_id=b.account_id) left join job c on a.account_id=c.account_id) where a.account_id in ( select distinct d.account_id from account d where name like CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%'))
